mapper.select: SELECT s.cartNo, s.userNo, u.userName, u.userID, u.userAddress, s.prodNo, s.prodSize, p.engName, p.korName, p.modelNo, c.prodPrice, p.filePath, p.saveName, p.orgName, (SELECT SUM(c2.prodPrice) FROM ShoppingCart s2 INNER JOIN Products p2 ON s2.prodNo = p2.prodNo INNER JOIN Category c2 ON p2.categoryNo = c2.categoryNo WHERE s2.userNo = s.userNo) AS totalPrice FROM ShoppingCart s INNER JOIN Products p ON s.prodNo = p.prodNo INNER JOIN Category c ON p.categoryNo = c.categoryNo INNER JOIN Users u ON s.userNo = u.userNo WHERE s.userNo = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO History (userNo, prodNo, shippingStatus, prodPrice, prodSize, purchaseDate) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{prodNo}, '준비중', #{prodPrice}, #{prodSize}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT h.historyNo, h.userNo, h.prodNo, s.cartNo, u.userName, u.userID, u.userAddress, h.prodPrice, h.prodSize, p.engName, p.korName, p.modelNo, h.shippingStatus, h.purchaseDate, p.filePath, p.saveName, p.orgName, (SELECT SUM(c2.prodPrice) FROM ShoppingCart s2 INNER JOIN Products p2 ON s2.prodNo = p2.prodNo INNER JOIN Category c2 ON p2.categoryNo = c2.categoryNo WHERE s2.userNo = h.userNo) AS totalPrice FROM History h LEFT JOIN ShoppingCart s ON h.userNo = s.userNo AND h.prodNo = s.prodNo INNER JOIN Products p ON h.prodNo = p.prodNo INNER JOIN Category c ON p.categoryNo = c.categoryNo INNER JOIN Users u ON h.userNo = u.userNo WHERE h.userNo = #{userNo} order by purchaseDate
